metadata.name: By-the-wind Sailor
metadata.description:
The By-the-wind Sailor spaceship is the pioneer of the Velella fleet. 
No surprise it's the first one to be presented here. 

Directly inspired by the "velella velella", it is recognizable by its emblematic sail that caps the structure. 
Flying through different worlds, this vessel aims to map the planets visited. 
Its sail and hull are able to adapt to the environment, allowing for a discreet, almost camouflaged approach. 

Drones are constantly flying around the craft, providing a more detailed analysis of the surroundings.

As the standard bearer of the Velella fleet, this peaceful vessel symbolises the spirit of the project. The exploration and study of the world around us.


JPEG file - 6580x10000
